Name: Momo's Mansion
About the game: Welcome...to Momo's Mansion, this is a story of one kitten's journey to find the most playful and comfortable places around. Join Momo and their animal friends on an epic journey of adventure and self discovery. Some features include : -Recruitment System. -Open world maps. -Ton of equipment upgrades! -Mining, Logging, Fishing, Harvesting and more! -Fetch Quests. -Item Gathering. -Resting in 'Comfy Spots' and playing in 'Playful Spots'. -Puzzles. -Helping animals / petting animals and so much more! Will you join me?
